entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:07 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
